data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Updates on Acquisition
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 as amended in Continuation to our latest Communications dated March 01 2025; the Company has infused additional Investment of Rs. 18006311 for acquisition of 3586310 ordinary Shares of @ Rand 1 each in Mbodla Investments Pty Ltd South Africa Joint Venture. Post additional funding the stake of the company will remain 49% in the aforesaid Joint Venture.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of Tinna Rubber And Infrastructure Limited in their meeting held on Friday May 23 2025 has considered and recommended the re-appointment of Mr. Gaurav Sekhri Joint Managing Director for a consecutive period of 3 years effective from September 10 2025 subject to approval of shareholders in ensuing annual general meeting as per submission made hereunder

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Dividend Updates
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of Tinna Rubber And Infrastructure Limited in their meeting held on Friday May 23 2025 has considered and recommended a final dividend @ 40% of face value i.e. Rs. 4 per equity share of face value of Rs. 10/- each for the financial year 2024-25 subject to approval of shareholders in ensuing annual general meeting as per submission made hereunder

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended On March 31 2025
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 as amended the Board of Directors of Tinna Rubber And Infrastructure Limited in their meeting held on Friday May 23 2025 has considered and approved the audited financial results & statements for the fourth quarter and financial year ended on March 31 2025 as per made hereunder

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended On March 31 2025
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 as amended the Board of Directors of Tinna Rubber And Infrastructure Limited in their meeting held on Friday May 23 2025 has considered and approved the audited financial results & statements for the fourth quarter and financial year ended on March 31 2025 as per made hereunder

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Of Directors Meeting Of Tinna Rubber And Infrastructure Limited Held On Friday May 23 2025
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 as amended the Board of Directors of Tinna Rubber And Infrastructure Limited in its meeting held and concluded on Friday May 23 2025 has inter alia considered and approved the matters as per submission made hereunder.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: In compliance with the provisions of Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 as amended we hereby inform your good office that Tinna Rubber And Infrastructure Limitedis conducting earnings conference call on Monday May 26 2025 at 02:00 P.M. (IST) to discuss the financial and operational performance of the Company for the fourth quarter and year ended on March 31 2025 (Q4 & FY25) as per submission annexed.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Meeting Of The Board Of Director Of Tinna Rubber And Infrastructure Limited Scheduled To Be Held On Friday May 23 2025
data.news_body: Tinna Rubber And Infrastructure Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 23/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve (i) audited standalone and consolidated financial results of the company for the fourth quarter and financial year ended on March 31 2025 along with auditors report thereon; and (ii) the recommendation of final dividend for the financial year 2024-25 if any; and (iii) any other matter

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 6(1)(c) of SEBI (Delisting of Equity Shares) Regulations 2021 as amended please find attached herewith newpaper publication for public notice issued today May 07 2025 for voluntary delisting of equity shares of the Tinna Rubber And Infrastructure Limited from the Calcutta Stock Exchange Limited

data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: In compliance of Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 as amended and in continuation to our earlier communication dated April 19 2025 regarding offering/tendering equity shares consequent to letter of offer for buyback of equity shares announced by BGK Infratech Pvt Ltd

The schedule  of meeting is subject to change as per availability.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 as amended we wish to inform that the repesentatives of Tinna Rubber And Infrastructure Limited will be participating in investors meetings with selected investors from Apr 22-24 2025 as per schedule detailed in the submission. The Schedule is subject to change as per availability

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Of Director Meeting Of Tinna Rubber And Infrastructure Limited Held On Saturday April 19 2025
data.news_body: In Compliance with Regulations 30  and 30(4) the Board of Director of the Company in their meeting held on today Saturday April 19 2025 has inter alia  considered and approved the Following:                                                                                     (i) Voluntary Delisting of Equity Shares of the Company from the Calcutta Stock Exchange Limited("CSE") Regional Stock Exchange subject to Regulatory approvals. However the Company shall Continue to be Listed on the BSE Limited (BSE) and the National Stock Exchange("NSE")                                                                                                                                          (ii) To Tender upto 145000 Equity Shares @ Rs.400 per share in a proposed buyback pursuant to a letter of offer for buyback of equity shares by BGK Infratech Pvt Ltd received by the Company

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 as amended we enclose herewith press/media release with respect to successful listing of 17129500 equity shares of Tinna Rubber And Infrastructure Limited (NSE Symbol: TINNARUBR) on the main board of the National Stock Exchange of India Limited effective from today Thursday April 17 2025

data.caption: Listing And Trading Of 17129500 Equity Shares Of Rs. 10/- Each Of The Company On The Main Board Of The National Stock Exchange Of India Limited With Effect From April 17 2025
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 as amended we would like to inform you that in addition to the BSE Limited and the Calcutta Stock Exchange Limited the entire 17129500 equity shares of Rs. 10/- each of Tinna Rubber And Infrastructure Limited shall be listed and traded on main board of the National Stock Exchange of India Limited effective from April 17 2025 vide NSE letters/circulars dated April 15 2025

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Board Of Directors Meeting Scheduled To Be Held On Saturday April 19 2025
data.news_body: Tinna Rubber And Infrastructure Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 19/04/2025 inter alia to consider and approve (i) Proposal of Voluntary Delisting of Equity Shares of the Company from the Calcutta Stock Exchange Limited a Regional Stock Exchange ; and (ii) Any Other Matter.

data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 74(5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018 as amended we submit herewith confirmation certificate received from our Register and Transfer Agent dated April 07 2025 for the quarter ended on March 31 2025.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI (PIT) Regulations and any other regulations as amended from time to time this is to inform that the Trading Window for trading in securities of Tinna Rubber and Infrastructure Limited will be closed for designated persons their immediate relatives and connected persons thereof with effect from Tuesday April 01 2025 till the completion of 48 hours after the audited (standalone and consolidated) financial results for the fourth quarter and financial year ended on March 31 2025 is generally made available to the public. The date of Board meeting to consider and approve the said audited financial results shall be intimated seperatelly

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting_ Audited Results & Recommendation Of Dividend
data.news_body:
Dear Sir,
With reference to the above subject ,This is to inform you that the Meeting of Board of Directors of Tinna Rubber and Infrastructure Limited held today i.e. 25th May,2022,the Board has taken inter-alia, the following decision: -
1. The Board has approved Audited Financial Results (both Standalone and consolidated) along with Auditor''s Report for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2022.
2. The Board has recommended dividend of Rs. 4/- Per Equity Shares of face value of Rs. 10/- each (i.e. 40%) for the year ended 31stMarch 2022, subject to approval of shareholders in the ensuing Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the company. The record date will be intimated in due course of time.

The meeting of board of directors commenced at 4.00 PM and concluded at 9.30 PM

Please find enclosed herewith the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Year ended 31st March, 2021, along with Audit Report and Press release thereon. These Financial Results were duly reviewed by Audit Committee.
The above financial results have been duly approved by the Board of Directors at its meeting held today, i.e. 30th June, 2021 which commenced at 8.00 P.M. and concluded at 11.00 P.M.
Kindly acknowledge the receipt and take the same on record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/Ma'am,
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015, we enclose herewith a copy of Investor Presentation that will be shared with the investors.
The same shall be uploaded on our website www.tinna.in
We request you to kindly take the above information on record.
